comment._content: Original caption seems to be Ed. W. Guinner?

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: And there was an Edward Gwinner who was co-owner of the Pittsburgh Rebels, of the old Federal League, in 1914.  Can't find a picture of him to connect the dots, though.

comment._content: pennyrichardsca: Thanks for catching the caption on the negative.  We will correct the title when we update.
